import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import './post.css' import postImg from '../../assets/images/caoBang.jpeg' import Navbar from '../navbar/Navbar' import {useLocation} from 'react-router' import axios from 'axios'; export default function Post() { const location = useLocation() const path = (location.pathname.split("/")[2]); const [post, setPost] = useState({}) useEffect(() => { const getPost = async(req) => { const res = await axios.get('/posts/' + path); } getPost(res.data) }, [path]) return (
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adip
